test.sql: SELECT COUNT(*), MIN(*), MAX(*), SUM(*), FIRST(*), LAST(*), CONCAT(*), VAR(*), STDEV(*), TO_INT32(*) FROM Employees

expectedError.text: Aggregation modifier '*' not allowed in function call 'MIN(*)'.
